about_the_game:
Devin Night: Tome of Beasts Pack 5 - Dust Goblin - Loxoda


Pack five from Kobold Press' Tome of Beast book.

This token pack includes:

  • Golem Dust
  • Golem Eye
  • Golem Hoard
  • Golem Salt
  • 2 Golem Smaragdine
  • Golem Steam
  • Gray Thirster
  • Gremlin Rum
  • Grim Jester
  • Gug
  • Hag Blood
  • Hag Red
  • Hag Sand
  • Harpy Owl
  • Haugbui
  • Herald of Blood
  • Herald of Darkness
  • Horakh
  • Hound of the Night
  • 2 Hulking Whelp
  • Hundun
  • Ice Maiden
  • Idolic Diety
  • Imy Ut Ushabti
  • Isonade
  • Jaculus
  • Kalke
  • Kikimora
  • Kobold Alchemist
  • Kobold Chieftan
  • Kobold Trapsmith
  • Kobold Worker
  • Kongamato
  • Koschei
  • Kot Bayun
  • 2 Krake Spawn
  • Lantern Dragonette
  • Lemurfolk
  • Leshy
  • Library Automaton
  • Lich Hound
  • Likho
  • Lindwurm
  • 2 Liosalfar
  • Living Wick
  • Lorelei
  • Loxoda

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on July 31, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night: Tome of Beasts Pack 5 - Dust Goblin - Loxoda (Token Pack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
